member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostDecoded

member.summary: Gets the customer information field (may be empty for Standard format).

member.summary: Gets the customer information encoding table, if present.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostDecoded.IsCustomerInfoAmbiguous
member.summary: Gets whether the customer information encoding was ambiguous.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostDecoded.Value
member.summary: Gets the concatenated payload (DPID + customer info).

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostDecoder
member.summary: Decodes Australia Post customer barcodes.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostDecoder.TryDecode(CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to decode an Australia Post customer barcode from a .

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostDecoder.TryDecode(CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix,System.Nullable{CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostCustomerEncodingTable},CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostDecoded@)
member.summary: Attempts to decode an Australia Post customer barcode from a .
member.remarks: For Customer Barcode 3 (67 bars), numeric-only customer data can be ambiguous between N and C tables. Provide to disambiguate if needed.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostEncoder
member.summary: Encodes Australia Post customer barcodes.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostEncoder.Encode(System.String)
member.summary: Encodes an Australia Post customer barcode into a .
member.remarks: Supported payload lengths: 8 (Standard), 13 (Customer 2, C table), 16 (Customer 2, N table), 18 (Customer 3, C table), 23 (Customer 3, N table).

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostFormat
member.summary: Australia Post customer barcode formats.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostFormat.Standard
member.summary: Standard Customer Barcode (37 bars).

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostFormat.Customer2
member.summary: Customer Barcode 2 (52 bars).

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostFormat.Customer3
member.summary: Customer Barcode 3 (67 bars).

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostCustomerEncodingTable
member.summary: Customer information encoding tables for Australia Post customer barcodes.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostCustomerEncodingTable.N
member.summary: N Encoding Table (numeric digits).

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.AustraliaPost.AustraliaPostCustomerEncodingTable.C
member.summary: C Encoding Table (alphanumeric + space/#).

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.AztecDecodeDiagnostics
member.summary: Diagnostics for Aztec decoding.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.AztecDecodeDiagnostics.AttemptCount
member.summary: Number of decode attempts (threshold/orientation combinations).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.AztecDecodeDiagnostics.InvertedTried
member.summary: True when inverted decoding was attempted.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.AztecDecodeDiagnostics.MirroredTried
member.summary: True when mirrored decoding was attempted.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.AztecDecodeDiagnostics.Success
member.summary: True when decode succeeded.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.AztecDecodeDiagnostics.Failure
member.summary: Optional failure message when decoding fails.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.Aztec.AztecEncodeOptions
member.summary: Options for future Aztec encoding support.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.Aztec.AztecEncodeOptions.Layers
member.summary: Target number of layers. When null, the encoder will choose automatically.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.Aztec.AztecEncodeOptions.ErrorCorrectionPercent
member.summary: Target error correction percentage. When null, the encoder will choose automatically.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.Aztec.AztecEncodeOptions.Compact
member.summary: When true, encode as compact Aztec when possible.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.Barcode
member.summary: Simple barcode helpers with fluent and static APIs.
member.remarks: Use to pick the output format by file extension.

example.code: using CodeGlyphX; Barcode.Save(BarcodeType.Code128, "PRODUCT-12345", "barcode.png");

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.Barcode1D
member.summary: A simple 1D barcode represented as an alternating sequence of bar/space segments.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.Barcode1D.Segments
member.summary: Gets the barcode segments in order.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.Barcode1D.TotalModules
member.summary: Gets the total barcode width in modules (sum of for all segments).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.Barcode1D.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{CodeGlyphX.BarSegment})
member.summary: Creates a new from the provided segments.
member.param: Barcode segments in order (must contain at least one segment).

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecoded
member.summary: Result of decoding a 1D barcode payload.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecoded.Type
member.summary: Gets the decoded barcode type.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecoded.Text
member.summary: Gets the decoded text (for EAN/UPC add-ons this includes a '+' suffix, e.g. "123456789012+12").

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeDiagnostics
member.summary: Diagnostics for 1D barcode decoding.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeDiagnostics.CandidateCount
member.summary: Number of scanline candidates tested.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeDiagnostics.AttemptCount
member.summary: Number of decode attempts across transforms.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeDiagnostics.InvertedTried
member.summary: True when an inverted candidate was tried.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeDiagnostics.ReversedTried
member.summary: True when a reversed candidate was tried.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeDiagnostics.Success
member.summary: True when decode succeeded.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeDiagnostics.Failure
member.summary: Optional failure message when decoding fails.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions
member.summary: Options controlling how 1D barcode decoding behaves.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions.Code39Checksum
member.summary: Controls how Code39 checksum characters are handled during decode.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions.MsiChecksum
member.summary: Controls how MSI checksum digits are handled during decode.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions.Code11Checksum
member.summary: Controls how Code 11 checksum characters are handled during decode.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions.PlesseyChecksum
member.summary: Controls whether Plessey CRC validation is required during decode.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions.EnableTileScan
member.summary: Enables tile-based scanning for multiple barcodes in one image.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions.TileGrid
member.summary: Tile grid size for multi-scan (0 = auto, 2..4 recommended).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions.WithCode39Checksum(CodeGlyphX.Code39ChecksumPolicy)
member.summary: Sets Code39 checksum handling.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions.WithMsiChecksum(CodeGlyphX.MsiChecksumPolicy)
member.summary: Sets MSI checksum handling.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions.WithCode11Checksum(CodeGlyphX.Code11ChecksumPolicy)
member.summary: Sets Code 11 checksum handling.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions.WithPlesseyChecksum(CodeGlyphX.PlesseyChecksumPolicy)
member.summary: Sets Plessey CRC handling.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions.WithTileScan(System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enables or disables tile scanning for multiple barcodes.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.Code39ChecksumPolicy
member.summary: Policy for handling optional Code39 checksum characters.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.Code39ChecksumPolicy.None
member.summary: Do not strip checksum characters (default, avoids accidental data loss).

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.Code39ChecksumPolicy.StripIfValid
member.summary: Strip the trailing character if it matches a valid checksum.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.Code39ChecksumPolicy.RequireValid
member.summary: Require a valid checksum and strip it; otherwise decoding fails.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.MsiChecksumPolicy
member.summary: Policy for handling optional MSI checksum digits.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.MsiChecksumPolicy.None
member.summary: Do not strip checksum digits (default, avoids accidental data loss).

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.MsiChecksumPolicy.StripIfValid
member.summary: Strip trailing checksum digit(s) when valid.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.MsiChecksumPolicy.RequireValid
member.summary: Require valid checksum digit(s); otherwise decoding fails.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.Code11ChecksumPolicy
member.summary: Policy for handling optional Code 11 checksum characters.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.Code11ChecksumPolicy.None
member.summary: Do not strip checksum characters (default, avoids accidental data loss).

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.Code11ChecksumPolicy.StripIfValid
member.summary: Strip trailing checksum character(s) when valid.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.Code11ChecksumPolicy.RequireValid
member.summary: Require valid checksum character(s); otherwise decoding fails.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.PlesseyChecksumPolicy
member.summary: Policy for handling Plessey CRC validation.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.PlesseyChecksumPolicy.None
member.summary: Do not validate CRC.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.PlesseyChecksumPolicy.StripIfValid
member.summary: Validate CRC and ignore mismatches.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.PlesseyChecksumPolicy.RequireValid
member.summary: Require valid CRC; otherwise decoding fails.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions
member.summary: Options for unified QR/barcode decoding.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.ExpectedBarcode
member.summary: Expected barcode type (optional hint for 1D decoding).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Barcode
member.summary: Options for 1D barcode decoding.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Code39Checksum
member.summary: Controls how Code39 checksum characters are handled during decode.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.MsiChecksum
member.summary: Controls how MSI checksum digits are handled during decode.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Code11Checksum
member.summary: Controls how Code 11 checksum characters are handled during decode.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.PlesseyChecksum
member.summary: Controls whether Plessey CRC validation is required during decode.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.PreferBarcode
member.summary: Prefer trying barcodes before 2D codes.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.IncludeBarcode
member.summary: Include 1D barcode results when decoding multiple symbols.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Qr
member.summary: QR decode options (profile, budget, etc.).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Image
member.summary: Image decode options for non-QR symbols.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Profile
member.summary: Speed/accuracy profile for QR pixel decoding (default: Robust).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.MaxDimension
member.summary: Maximum dimension (pixels) for QR decoding. Larger inputs will be downscaled by sampling. Set to 0 to disable.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.MaxScale
member.summary: Maximum scale to try when decoding QR (1..8). Set to 0 to use profile defaults.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.MaxMilliseconds
member.summary: Maximum milliseconds to spend decoding QR (best effort). Set to 0 to disable.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.DisableTransforms
member.summary: Disable rotation/mirroring attempts for QR decoding, even in robust profiles.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.AggressiveSampling
member.summary: Enables extra thresholding/sampling passes for stylized or noisy QR codes (slower).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.MaxImageDimension
member.summary: Maximum image dimension (pixels) for non-QR decoding. Larger inputs will be downscaled. Set to 0 to disable.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.MaxImageMilliseconds
member.summary: Maximum milliseconds to spend decoding non-QR symbols (best effort). Set to 0 to disable.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.CancellationToken
member.summary: Cancellation token for decoding.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Screen(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Screen preset (budgeted decode for UI capture scenarios).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Fast
member.summary: Fast preset (lower accuracy, fewer transforms).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Balanced
member.summary: Balanced preset (good default for most images).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Robust
member.summary: Robust preset (best accuracy, slower).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Stylized
member.summary: Stylized preset (adds aggressive sampling for QR art).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.WithBarcode(System.Action{CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions})
member.summary: Configures barcode decode options fluently.

member.summary: Configures QR decode options fluently.

member.summary: Configures image decode options fluently.

example.code: var options = new CodeGlyphDecodeOptions() .WithJpegOptions(highQualityChroma: true, allowTruncated: true);

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.Internal.RegexCache.DigitsOptional
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[0-9]*$
Options:
RegexOptions.CultureInvariant
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
Match a character in the set [0-9] atomically any number of times.
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.Internal.RegexCache.DigitsRequired
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[0-9]+$
Options:
RegexOptions.CultureInvariant
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
Match a character in the set [0-9] atomically at least once.
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.Internal.RegexCache.CountryCode
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[A-Za-z]{2}$
Options:
RegexOptions.CultureInvariant
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
Match an ASCII letter exactly 2 times.
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.Internal.RegexCache.IbanBasic
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[a-zA-Z]{2}[0-9]{2}([a-zA-Z0-9]?){16,30}$
Options:
RegexOptions.CultureInvariant
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
Match an ASCII letter exactly 2 times.
Match a character in the set [0-9] exactly 2 times.
Loop greedily at least 16 and at most 30 times.
1st capture group.
Match an ASCII letter or digit greedily, optionally.
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.Internal.RegexCache.Bic
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^([a-zA-Z]{4}[a-zA-Z]{2}[a-zA-Z0-9]{2}([a-zA-Z0-9]{3})?)$
Options:
RegexOptions.CultureInvariant
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
1st capture group.
Match an ASCII letter exactly 6 times.
Match an ASCII letter or digit exactly 2 times.
Optional (greedy).
2nd capture group.
Match an ASCII letter or digit exactly 3 times.
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.Internal.RegexCache.HexPlain
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\A\\b[0-9a-fA-F]+\\b\\Z
Options:
RegexOptions.CultureInvariant
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
Match if at a word boundary.
Match a hexadecimal digit atomically at least once.
Match if at a word boundary.
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.Internal.RegexCache.HexWithPrefix
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\A\\b(0[xX])?[0-9a-fA-F]+\\b\\Z
Options:
RegexOptions.CultureInvariant
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
Match if at a word boundary.
Optional (greedy).
1st capture group.
Match '0'.
Match a character in the set [Xx].
Match a hexadecimal digit atomically at least once.
Match if at a word boundary.
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.Internal.RegexCache.WhatsappSanitize
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[0+]+|[ ()-]
Options:
RegexOptions.CultureInvariant
Explanation:
Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match if at the beginning of the string.
Match a character in the set [+0] atomically at least once.
Match a character in the set [ ()\-].

member.remarks:
Normalization rules:
Ignores ASCII whitespace, - separators and = padding.
Accepts upper and lower case.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.Pdf417Code

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions
member.summary: Simple options for QR rendering.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ModuleSize
member.summary: Module size in pixels.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.QuietZone
member.summary: Quiet zone size in modules.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.TargetSizePx
member.summary: Target output size in pixels (0 = disabled). When set, module size is adjusted to fit this target.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.TargetSizeIncludesQuietZone
member.summary: When true, includes the quiet zone.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ErrorCorrectionLevel
member.summary: Optional error correction level override.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.TextEncoding
member.summary: Optional text encoding override (when set, emits ECI for non-default encodings).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.IncludeEci
member.summary: When true, emits ECI headers for non-default encodings.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.RespectPayloadDefaults
member.summary: When true, payload defaults may override version/ECC settings.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.MinVersion
member.summary: Minimum QR version (1..40).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.MaxVersion
member.summary: Maximum QR version (1..40).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ForceMask
member.summary: Optional forced mask pattern (0..7).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.Foreground
member.summary: Foreground color.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.Background
member.summary: Background color.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.BackgroundGradient
member.summary: Optional background gradient.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.BackgroundPattern
member.summary: Optional pattern overlay for the QR background area.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.BackgroundSupersample
member.summary: Background supersample factor for gradients/patterns (1 = disabled).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.Style
member.summary: Style preset for PNG rendering.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.Art
member.summary: High-level QR art options (theme + variant + intensity).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ArtAutoTune
member.summary: When true, applies scan-safety auto-tuning for art-heavy styles.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ArtAutoTuneMinScore
member.summary: Minimum safety score target (0..100) for art auto-tuning.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ModuleShape
member.summary: Overrides the module shape (when set).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ModuleScale
member.summary: Overrides the module scale (0.1..1.0).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ModuleScaleMap
member.summary: Overrides the module scale map.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ModuleShapeMap
member.summary: Overrides the module shape map.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ModuleJitter
member.summary: Overrides per-module jitter options.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ProtectFunctionalPatterns
member.summary: When true, keeps non-eye functional patterns at a stable, scan-friendly style.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ProtectQuietZone
member.summary: When true and a background pattern is enabled, preserves a clean quiet zone.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ModuleCornerRadiusPx
member.summary: Overrides the module corner radius in pixels.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ForegroundGradient
member.summary: Overrides the foreground gradient.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ForegroundPalette
member.summary: Overrides the foreground palette.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ForegroundPattern
member.summary: Overrides the foreground pattern overlay.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.ForegroundPaletteZones
member.summary: Overrides palette zones.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.Canvas
member.summary: Optional canvas options for sticker-style output.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.Debug
member.summary: Optional debug overlay options (PNG only).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.Eyes
member.summary: Overrides eye (finder) styling.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.LogoPng
member.summary: Optional logo PNG bytes (embedded for PNG/SVG/HTML).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.LogoScale
member.summary: Logo size relative to the QR area (excluding quiet zone).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.LogoPaddingPx
member.summary: Padding around the logo in pixels.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.LogoDrawBackground
member.summary: Whether to draw a background plate behind the logo. When enabled, the encoder may auto-bump the minimum version for scan safety.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.AutoBumpVersionForLogoBackground
member.summary: When true, bumps to a safer minimum for logo background plates.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.LogoBackgroundMinVersion
member.summary: Minimum version to use when a logo background plate is enabled (0 = disable auto bump).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.LogoBackground
member.summary: Logo background color (defaults to QR background).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.LogoCornerRadiusPx
member.summary: Logo background corner radius in pixels.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.JpegQuality
member.summary: JPEG quality (1..100).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.JpegOptions
member.summary: Optional JPEG encoding options (subsampling/progressive/metadata/etc). When set, overrides where applicable.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.WebpQuality
member.summary: WebP quality (0..100). A value of 100 uses lossless VP8L.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.IcoSizes
member.summary: ICO output sizes in pixels (1..256). Defaults to common icon sizes.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.IcoPreserveAspectRatio
member.summary: When true, preserves aspect ratio and pads to square for ICO.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.HtmlEmailSafeTable
member.summary: When true, renders HTML using email-safe tables.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.QrErrorCorrectionLevel
member.summary: QR Code error correction level.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.QrErrorCorrectionLevel.M
member.summary: Medium (~15%).

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.QrErrorCorrectionLevel.Q
member.summary: Quartile (~25%).

member.summary: Neon sparkle eyes for dark canvases.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrEyePresets.Sunburst
member.summary: Sunburst rays around eyes with safe spacing.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrEyePresets.MinimalRing
member.summary: Minimal ring eyes with subtle accents.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrEyePresets.RetroTarget

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugMode
member.summary: Debug visualization modes for pixel-based QR decoding.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugMode.Grayscale
member.summary: Raw grayscale image.

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugMode.Threshold
member.summary: Threshold map (constant or adaptive).

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugMode.Binarized
member.summary: Binarized image (black/white).

member.name: F:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugMode.Heatmap
member.summary: Heatmap of luminance vs threshold.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions
member.summary: Options for QR pixel debug rendering.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions.Scale
member.summary: Downscale factor applied before analysis (1..8).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions.OutputScale
member.summary: Upscale factor for the output visualization (default 1).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions.ContrastStretch
member.summary: Apply contrast stretch before thresholding.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions.ContrastStretchMinRange
member.summary: Minimum contrast range for stretch (default 40).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions.BoxBlurRadius
member.summary: Apply a box blur before thresholding (radius in pixels).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions.NormalizeBackground
member.summary: Normalize background gradients using local mean subtraction.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions.NormalizeWindowSize
member.summary: Window size for background normalization (odd >= 3).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions.AdaptiveThreshold
member.summary: Use adaptive thresholding (local window).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions.AdaptiveWindowSize
member.summary: Window size for adaptive thresholding (odd >= 3).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions.AdaptiveOffset
member.summary: Offset subtracted from the local mean (0..255).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions.Invert
member.summary: Invert black/white classification for binarized/heatmap outputs.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeInfo
member.summary: Diagnostics returned by pixel-based QR decoding attempts.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeInfo.Scale
member.summary: Gets the scale factor applied before decoding.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeInfo.Threshold
member.summary: Gets the binarization threshold (0..255).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeInfo.Invert
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the image was inverted.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeInfo.CandidateCount
member.summary: Gets the number of candidate finder patterns detected.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeInfo.CandidateTriplesTried
member.summary: Gets the number of finder triples evaluated.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeInfo.Dimension
member.summary: Gets the decoded module dimension, when available.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeInfo.Module
member.summary: Gets the underlying module-level diagnostics.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeInfo.IsSuccess
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether decoding succeeded.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeInfo.Confidence
member.summary: Gets a confidence score (0..1) for the decode.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions
member.summary: Options for pixel-based QR decoding.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.Profile
member.summary: Speed/accuracy profile (default: Robust).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.MaxDimension
member.summary: Maximum dimension (pixels) for decoding. Larger inputs will be downscaled by sampling. Set to 0 to disable.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.MaxScale
member.summary: Maximum scale to try when decoding (1..8). Set to 0 to use profile defaults.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.MaxMilliseconds
member.summary: Maximum milliseconds to spend decoding (best effort). Set to 0 to disable.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.BudgetMilliseconds
member.summary: Hard budget in milliseconds for decoding (best effort), without profile downgrades. When set, this is used for internal time budgeting instead of MaxMilliseconds.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.AutoCrop
member.summary: Attempts to auto-crop likely QR regions before decoding (useful for screenshots).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.EnableTileScan
member.summary: Enables tile-based scanning for multiple QR codes in one image.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.TileGrid
member.summary: Tile grid size for multi-scan (0 = auto, 2..4 recommended).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.DisableTransforms
member.summary: Disable rotation/mirroring attempts even in robust profiles.

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.AggressiveSampling
member.summary: Enables extra thresholding/sampling passes for stylized or noisy QR codes (slower).

member.name: P:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.StylizedSampling
member.summary: Enables stylized sampling tuned for QR art (opt-in, slower).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.Fast
member.summary: Fast preset (lower accuracy, fewer transforms).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.Balanced
member.summary: Balanced preset (good default for most images).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.Robust
member.summary: Robust preset (best accuracy, slower).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.Stylized
member.summary: Stylized preset (adds aggressive sampling for QR art).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.Screen(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Screen preset (budgeted decode for UI capture scenarios).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithProfile(CodeGlyphX.QrDecodeProfile)

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithMaxDimension(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets maximum dimension (pixels) for QR decoding.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithMaxScale(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets maximum scale to try (1..8).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithMaxMilliseconds(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the maximum decode time budget.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithBudgetMilliseconds(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a hard decode time budget without profile downgrades.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithAutoCrop(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables auto-crop for QR decoding.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithBudget(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the time+dimension budget in one call.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithoutTransforms
member.summary: Disables rotation/mirroring attempts.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithAggressiveSampling(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables aggressive sampling.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Jpeg.JpegDecodeOptions
member.summary: JPEG decoding options.

example.code: var options = new JpegDecodeOptions(highQualityChroma: true, allowTruncated: true); var rgba = JpegReader.DecodeRgba32(data, out var width, out var height, options);

member.summary: Enables higher-quality chroma upsampling when components are subsampled.

member.summary: Allows truncated scan data (best-effort decode).

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.Rendering.RenderMode
member.summary: Output mode for vector-capable formats.
member.remarks: Vector output is the default for PDF/EPS. Raster mode uses pixel rendering and is recommended when gradients, logos, or bitmap-only effects are needed.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Webp.WebpManagedDecoder.TryDecodeRgba32(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.Byte[]@,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Attempts to decode WebP to RGBA32 using a managed implementation.
member.remarks: Supported: VP8 (lossy, keyframe stills) and VP8L (lossless). Supported: VP8 + ALPH alpha chunk and animated WebP (first-frame decode). Not supported: metadata-only containers. The call site prefers this path and does not fall back to native decoding.

member.summary: Managed VP8 lossy encoder (minimal intra-only encoder).

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Webp.WebpVp8lEncoder
member.summary: Managed VP8L lossless encoder (subset) for RGBA images.

member.name: T:CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Webp.WebpWriter
member.summary: Managed WebP writer (VP8L lossless subset + VP8 lossy intra + animation container).

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Webp.WebpWriter.WriteRgba32(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes an RGBA32 buffer as WebP lossless (managed VP8L subset).
member.remarks: Current limitations: - VP8L lossless is a managed subset; single prefix-code group (no entropy tiling). - Limited LZ77/back-reference search; favors short distances. - Color indexing is limited to palettes up to 256 colors.

member.summary: Encodes an RGBA32 buffer as WebP lossless (managed VP8L subset).

member.summary: Encodes an RGBA32 buffer as WebP lossless (managed VP8L subset) with metadata chunks.

member.name: M:CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Webp.WebpWriter.WriteRgba32Lossy(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes an RGBA32 buffer as a lossy WebP using a managed VP8 (lossy) bitstream when possible.
member.remarks: Falls back to VP8L with pre-quantized RGB when VP8 lossy encoding is unavailable.
